card.name: Hide // Seek

alternate.name: Hide
alternate.property: Put target artifact or enchantment on the bottom of its owner's library.

alternate.name: Seek
alternate.property: Search target opponent's library for a card and exile it. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost. Then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Seal of Doom
card.property: Sacrifice Seal of Doom: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A basilisk's gaze is effective, but disposing of physical remains is a tiresome task. It's far more discrete to dissolve one's victim entirely." —Szadek

card.name: Pain Magnification
card.property: Whenever an opponent is dealt 3 or more damage by a single source, that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Rakdos make sure their victims remember their pain—or at least give up a little bit of their sanity in order to forget.

card.name: Vigean Intuition
card.property: Choose a card type, then reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. (Artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal are card types.)

card.name: Twinstrike
card.property: Twinstrike deals 2 damage to each of two target creatures. Hellbent — Destroy those creatures instead if you have no cards in hand.

card.name: Azorius Herald
card.property: Azorius Herald can't be blocked. When Azorius Herald enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. When Azorius Herald enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {U} was spent to cast it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As peace should be—gentle yet unstoppable." —Augustin IV

card.name: Soulsworn Jury
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {1}{U}, Sacrifice Soulsworn Jury: Counter target creature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In death, as in life, they protect the Grand Arbiter from exposure to contrary points of view.

card.name: Spell Snare
card.property: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every culture has its unlucky numbers. In a city where you're either alone, in a crowd, or being stabbed in the back, two is the worst number of all.

card.name: Might of the Nephilim
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each of its colors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Send a runner to Tin Street, and tell 'em the delivery has been . . . uh . . . held up." —Bonmod, caravan rear guard

card.name: Macabre Waltz
card.property: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All dead move to the hollow rhythm of necromancy." —Savra

card.name: Supply // Demand

alternate.name: Supply
alternate.property: Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

alternate.name: Demand
alternate.property: Search your library for a multicolored card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Ratcatcher
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) At the beginning of your upkeep, you may search your library for a Rat card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An ogre's poisonous stench is like fine Kashkaval cheese to the noses lowest to the ground.

card.name: Stormscale Anarch
card.property: {2} {R}, Discard a card at random: Stormscale Anarch deals 2 damage to any target. If the discarded card was multicolored, Stormscale Anarch deals 4 damage to that permanent or player instead.

card.name: Pride of the Clouds
card.property: Flying Pride of the Clouds gets +1/+1 for each other creature with flying on the battlefield. Forecast — {2}{W}{U}, Reveal Pride of the Clouds from your hand: Create a 1/1 white and blue Bird creature token with flying. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

card.name: Aethermage's Touch
card.property: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. It gains "At the beginning of your end step, return this creature to its owner's hand." Then put the rest of the cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Fertile Imagination
card.property: Choose a card type. Target opponent reveals their hand. Create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens for each card of the chosen type revealed this way. (Artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal are card types.)

card.name: Anthem of Rakdos
card.property: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn and Anthem of Rakdos deals 1 damage to you. Hellbent — As long as you have no cards in hand, if a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

card.name: Voidslime
card.property: Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is technically an ooze, but its lifespan measures only seconds. In that short time, its appetite for magic is extraordinary."—Simic research notes

card.name: Crypt Champion
card.property: Double strike When Crypt Champion enters the battlefield, each player puts a creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from their graveyard onto the battlefield. When Crypt Champion enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {R} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Avatar of Discord
card.property: ({B/R} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.) Flying When Avatar of Discord enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Such is the power of Rakdos that even his shadow takes on a cruel life of its own.

card.name: Flash Foliage
card.property: Cast this spell only during combat after blockers are declared. Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token that's blocking target creature attacking you. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This undemanding vegetation takes root in a mote of dust but grows incredibly quickly." —Simic research notes

card.name: Hellhole Rats
card.property: Haste When Hellhole Rats enters the battlefield, target player discards a card. Hellhole Rats deals damage to that player equal to that card's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I must speak with Momir Vig about creating a water-spouting watchdog." —Mathvan, Prahv scrollwarden

card.name: Steeling Stance
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Forecast — {W}, Reveal Steeling Stance from your hand: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

card.name: Bound // Determined
card.property: Sacrifice a creature. Return up to X cards from your graveyard to your hand, where X is the number of colors that creature was. Exile this card. // Other spells you control can't be countered this turn. Draw a card.

alternate.name: Bound
alternate.property: Sacrifice a creature. Return up to X cards from your graveyard to your hand, where X is the number of colors that creature was. Exile this card.

alternate.name: Determined
alternate.property: Other spells you control can't be countered this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Leafdrake Roost
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{G}{U}, {T}: Create a 2/2 green and blue Drake creature token with flying."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best experiments are those whose successes replicate themselves." —Yolov, Simic bioengineer

card.name: Lyzolda, the Blood Witch
card.property: {2}, Sacrifice a creature: Lyzolda, the Blood Witch deals 2 damage to any target if the sacrificed creature was red. Draw a card if the sacrificed creature was black.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sacrificial rites take place before an audience of cheering cultists, each begging to be the next on stage.

card.name: Nettling Curse
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, its controller loses 3 life. {1}{R}: Enchanted creature attacks this turn if able.

card.name: Whiptail Moloch
card.property: When Whiptail Moloch enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It wags its tail when it's happy. It wags its tail when it's angry. Nope, there's no good time to be around a whiptail." —Rugar, Leaguehall Infirmary patient

card.name: Muse Vessel
card.property: {3}, {T}: Target player exiles a card from their hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. {1}: Choose a card exiled with Muse Vessel. You may play that card this turn.

card.name: Azorius First-Wing
card.property: Flying, protection from enchantments

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With a steady diet of lawbreakers, Azorius griffins inevitably develop a resistance to the contraband magic that taints much of their prey.

card.name: Weight of Spires
card.property: Weight of Spires deals damage to target creature equal to the number of nonbasic lands that creature's controller controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Finally, a good use for an Azorius courthouse." —Ghut Rak, Gruul guildmage

card.name: Nihilistic Glee

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All ends in obliteration—love in hatred, life in death, and light in empty darkness."

card.name: Beacon Hawk
card.property: Flying Whenever Beacon Hawk deals combat damage to a player, you may untap target creature. {W}: Beacon Hawk gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Seal of Fire
card.property: Sacrifice Seal of Fire: It deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it breathes, it will burn." —Rakdos pyromancers' creed

card.name: Wakestone Gargoyle
card.property: Defender, flying {1}{W}: Creatures you control with defender can attack this turn as though they didn't have defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its pulsating cry shatters bonds of iron, granite, and servitude.

card.name: Simic Sky Swallower
card.property: Flying, trample Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We've bred out the shortcomings of the species' natural form and replaced them with assets of our own design." —Momir Vig

card.name: Grand Arbiter Augustin IV
card.property: White spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Blue spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Spells your opponents cast cost {1} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Arbiter is a conduit of justice, a will so disciplined that it dispenses justice without ego or remorse.

card.name: Skullmead Cauldron
card.property: {T}: You gain 1 life. {T}, Discard a card: You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once tasted, the flavor of skullmead lingers in the throat, a secret brand of guilt for those who partake in forbidden pleasures.

card.name: Writ of Passage
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, if its power is 2 or less, it can't be blocked this turn. Forecast — {1}{U}, Reveal Writ of Passage from your hand: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

card.name: Cytoplast Manipulator
card.property: Graft 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) {U}, {T}: Gain control of target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it for as long as Cytoplast Manipulator remains on the battlefield.

card.name: Nightcreep
card.property: Until end of turn, all creatures become black and all lands become Swamps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Please tell me I'm hallucinating. I'd rather be crazy than here." —Gorev Hadszak, Wojek investigator

card.name: Experiment Kraj
card.property: Experiment Kraj has all activated abilities of each other creature with a +1/+1 counter on it. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Of course it will grow beyond control—it was designed to choose its own evolution." —Momir Vig

card.name: Flaring Flame-Kin
card.property: As long as Flaring Flame-Kin is enchanted, it gets +2/+2, has trample, and has "{R}: Flaring Flame-Kin gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A flame-kin is always formidable, but feeding its fire with a sorcerous gift grants it the power to devastate armies.

card.name: Rakdos the Defiler
card.property: Flying, trample Whenever Rakdos the Defiler attacks, sacrifice half the non-Demon permanents you control, rounded up. Whenever Rakdos deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices half the non-Demon permanents they control, rounded up.

card.name: Novijen Sages
card.property: Graft 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) {1}, Remove two +1/+1 counters from among creatures you control: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Made of bone and boiled in blood, a Rakdos signet is not considered finished until it has been used as a murder weapon.

card.name: Momir Vig, Simic Visionary
card.property: Whenever you cast a green creature spell, you may search your library for a creature card and reveal it. If you do, shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. Whenever you cast a blue creature spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put that card into your hand.

card.name: Wrecking Ball
card.property: Destroy target creature or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rakdos festivals almost leave enough rubble in their wake to hide the bodies.

card.name: Windreaver
card.property: Flying {W}: Windreaver gains vigilance until end of turn. {W}: Windreaver gets +0/+1 until end of turn. {U}: Switch Windreaver's power and toughness until end of turn. {U}: Return Windreaver to its owner's hand.

card.name: Novijen, Heart of Progress
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {G}{U}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature that entered the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The unnatural pressures of life in this city are best withstood by lifeforms that adapt with unnatural swiftness." —Momir Vig

card.name: Brace for Impact
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target multicolored creature this turn. For each 1 damage prevented this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Flesh can be tempered by spellcraft and forged ever stronger by the hammers of foes.

card.name: Rix Maadi, Dungeon Palace
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}{B}{R}, {T}: Each player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even miles away, if you put your ear to the sewer vents, you can hear the screams and the tempestuous laughter.

card.name: Freewind Equenaut
card.property: Flying As long as Freewind Equenaut is enchanted, it has "{T}: Freewind Equenaut deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Confront her, and feel the hooves of her steed. Ignore her, and feel the sting of her arrow.

card.name: Haazda Exonerator
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Haazda Exonerator: Destroy target Aura.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This aura threatens the sanctity of your soul. Wrenching it free won't be easy on either of us. If you're ready, we'll begin."

card.name: Prahv, Spires of Order
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {4}{W}{U}, {T}: Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Prahv, where much work is done to make sure nothing is accomplished.

card.name: Minister of Impediments
card.property: ({W/U} can be paid with either {W} or {U}.) {T}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it takes forever to learn all the rules, no time is left for breaking them.

card.name: Celestial Ancient
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We thought the clouds had moved from the night sky. Then the night sky moved, and the horizon grew wings." —Josuri

card.name: Ocular Halo
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Draw a card." {W}: Enchanted creature gains vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While the soldier dreams, the eyes stand watch.

card.name: Simic Ragworm
card.property: {U}: Untap Simic Ragworm.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Infused with autochthon blood for size and hellion cells for speed, the ragworm is perfect for clearing the undergardens of both rats and vagrants." —Yolov, Simic bioengineer

card.name: Plumes of Peace
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. Forecast — {W}{U}, Reveal Plumes of Peace from your hand: Tap target creature. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

card.name: Simic Guildmage
card.property: ({G/U} can be paid with either {G} or {U}.) {1}{G}: Move a +1/+1 counter from target creature onto another target creature with the same controller. {1}{U}: Attach target Aura attached to a permanent to another permanent with the same controller.

card.name: Proclamation of Rebirth
card.property: Return up to three target creature cards with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Forecast — {5}{W}, Reveal Proclamation of Rebirth from your hand: Return target creature card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

card.name: Hit // Run

alternate.name: Hit
alternate.property: Target player sacrifices an artifact or creature. Hit deals damage to that player equal to that permanent's converted mana cost.

alternate.name: Run
alternate.property: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the Simic Combine, its sigil serves not as an emblem of honor but as a trademark. Its familiar image on any biological commodity attests to superb craftsmanship, ingenious innovation, and higher cost.

card.name: Thrive
card.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of X target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most successful of Simic creations is cytoplasm, a living, symbiotic substance that feeds off genetic rhythms and strengthens its host in return.

card.name: Condemn
card.property: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No doubt the arbiters would put you away, after all the documents are signed. But I will have justice now!" —Alovnek, Boros guildmage

card.name: Helium Squirter
card.property: Graft 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) {1}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Slithering Shade
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {B}: Slithering Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Hellbent — Slithering Shade can attack as though it didn't have defender as long as you have no cards in hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The maze-like design embodies the core of Azorius law—strict structure designed to test wills and stall change.

card.name: Isperia the Inscrutable
card.property: Flying Whenever Isperia the Inscrutable deals combat damage to a player, choose a card name. That player reveals their hand. If a card with the chosen name is revealed this way, search your library for a creature card with flying, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Silkwing Scout
card.property: Flying {G}, Sacrifice Silkwing Scout: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Stoic Ephemera
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying When Stoic Ephemera blocks, sacrifice it at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life is fleeting, and so is death. Only the oath is eternal."

card.name: Enigma Eidolon
card.property: {U}, Sacrifice Enigma Eidolon: Target player puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard. Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, you may return Enigma Eidolon from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Research // Development

alternate.name: Research
alternate.property: Choose up to four cards you own from outside the game and shuffle them into your library.

alternate.name: Development
alternate.property: Create a 3/1 red Elemental creature token unless any opponent has you draw a card. Repeat this process two more times.

card.name: Kindle the Carnage
card.property: Discard a card at random. If you do, Kindle the Carnage deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to each creature. You may repeat this process any number of times.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Start knockin' heads, boys, and don't stop 'til the ragamuffyn sings!"

card.name: Jagged Poppet
card.property: Whenever Jagged Poppet is dealt damage, discard that many cards. Hellbent — Whenever Jagged Poppet deals combat damage to a player, if you have no cards in hand, that player discards cards equal to the damage.

card.name: Carom
card.property: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn is dealt to another target creature instead. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her enemy's strength is her own.

card.name: Bronze Bombshell
card.property: When a player other than Bronze Bombshell's owner controls it, that player sacrifices it. If the player does, Bronze Bombshell deals 7 damage to the player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ooh, shiny! Let's pull off the chain and take her with us." —Ukl, Gruul raider, last words

card.name: Azorius Aethermage
card.property: Whenever a permanent is returned to your hand, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In her single metasphere are bound the records of every Aetheric transaction since the time of Azor.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Reluctant to meet face to face, the leaders of the ten guilds prefer to do official business through a go-between immune to bribes and threats.

card.name: Demonfire
card.property: Demonfire deals X damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead. Hellbent — If you have no cards in hand, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.

card.name: Utopia Sprawl
card.property: Enchant Forest As Utopia Sprawl enters the battlefield, choose a color. Whenever enchanted Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of the chosen color.

card.name: Flame-Kin War Scout
card.property: When another creature enters the battlefield, sacrifice Flame-Kin War Scout. If you do, Flame-Kin War Scout deals 4 damage to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The forward flame-kin are popping. We have incoming!" —Svar, Boros signaler

card.name: Demon's Jester
card.property: Flying Hellbent — Demon's Jester gets +2/+1 as long as you have no cards in hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They knock 'em dead, with or without the punch line.

card.name: Elemental Resonance
card.property: Enchant permanent At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add mana equal to enchanted permanent's mana cost. (Mana cost includes color. If a mana symbol has multiple colors, choose one.)

card.name: Slaughterhouse Bouncer
card.property: Hellbent — When Slaughterhouse Bouncer dies, if you have no cards in hand, target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A Rakdos party is a flop if anyone lives to talk about it.

card.name: Skyscribing
card.property: Each player draws X cards. Forecast — {2}{U}, Reveal Skyscribing from your hand: Each player draws a card. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

card.name: Mistral Charger
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some sky steeds break from the thundering herd to ride free on the open winds.

card.name: Haazda Shield Mate
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Haazda Shield Mate unless you pay {W}{W}. {W}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Haazda shield is broad, protecting both the free and the guilded.

card.name: Brain Pry
card.property: Choose a nonland card name. Target player reveals their hand. That player discards a card with that name. If they can't, you draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the Rakdos, the fun is in the shakedown. The loot is usually discarded.

card.name: Court Hussar
card.property: Vigilance When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {W} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Verdant Eidolon
card.property: {G}, Sacrifice Verdant Eidolon: Add three mana of any one color. Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, you may return Verdant Eidolon from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Assault Zeppelid
card.property: Flying, trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Show them to Razia and then to the Azorius sky marshals. We could create a fine bidding war—enough to fund the final stages of Project Kraj." —Momir Vig

card.name: Cytoshape
card.property: Choose a nonlegendary creature on the battlefield. Target creature becomes a copy of that creature until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Though highly effective at reshaping flesh, these specially bred cytoplasts leave the subject reeking of omnibian mucus." —Simic research notes

card.name: Vigean Graftmage
card.property: Graft 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) {1}{U}: Untap target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Trygon Predator
card.property: Flying Whenever Trygon Predator deals combat damage to a player, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Held aloft by metabolized magic, trygons are ravenous for sources of mystic fuel.

card.name: Sandstorm Eidolon
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice Sandstorm Eidolon: Target creature can't block this turn. Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, you may return Sandstorm Eidolon from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Sporeback Troll
card.property: Graft 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) {1}{G}: Regenerate target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Plaxcaster Frogling
card.property: Graft 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) {2}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Omnibian
card.property: {T}: Target creature becomes a Frog with base power and toughness 3/3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This creature has hyperevolved chameleonic abilities. It no longer mimics its surroundings, instead forcing them to take on its form." —Simic research notes

card.name: Cytospawn Shambler
card.property: Graft 6 (This creature enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) {G}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Rise // Fall

alternate.name: Rise
alternate.property: Return target creature card from a graveyard and target creature on the battlefield to their owners' hands.

alternate.name: Fall
alternate.property: Target player reveals two cards at random from their hand, then discards each nonland card revealed this way.

card.name: Loaming Shaman
card.property: When Loaming Shaman enters the battlefield, target player shuffles any number of target cards from their graveyard into their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His work determines who is remembered and who feeds the worms.

card.name: Rain of Gore
card.property: If a spell or ability would cause its controller to gain life, that player loses that much life instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stay indoors, away from what seeps over the thresholds. This is the Demon's work, and only ill can come of it." —Belko, owner of Titan's Keg tavern

card.name: Paladin of Prahv
card.property: Whenever Paladin of Prahv deals damage, you gain that much life. Forecast — {1}{W}, Reveal Paladin of Prahv from your hand: Whenever target creature deals damage this turn, you gain that much life. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

card.name: Rakdos Augermage
card.property: First strike {T}: Reveal your hand and discard a card of target opponent's choice. Then that player reveals their hand and discards a card of your choice. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Palliation Accord
card.property: Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, put a shield counter on Palliation Accord. Remove a shield counter from Palliation Accord: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

card.name: Ogre Gatecrasher
card.property: When Ogre Gatecrasher enters the battlefield, destroy target creature with defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A popular game among ogres is to see how many revolutions a head can make before it pops off.

card.name: Proper Burial
card.property: Whenever a creature you control dies, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Properly honored dead gain the peace of the grave and freedom from the call of the Ghost Quarter.

card.name: Ragamuffyn
card.property: Hellbent — {T}, Sacrifice a creature or land: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have no cards in hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They cut the stitches and give her sips of her brew. Then they sew her up again, and she's back to stirring.

card.name: Indrik Stomphowler
card.property: When Indrik Stomphowler enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "An indrik's howl has destructive power much subtler than that of its crushing foot. The sound is mundane, but inaudible vibrations scatter and sunder magical contrivances." —Simic research notes

card.name: Gobhobbler Rats
card.property: Hellbent — As long as you have no cards in hand, Gobhobbler Rats gets +1/+0 and has "{B}: Regenerate Gobhobbler Rats."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lyzolda's pet rats eat better than the average citizen. In fact, they can usually be found eating the average citizen.

card.name: Rakdos Carnarium
card.property: Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield tapped. When Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{R}.

card.name: Blood Crypt
card.property: ({T}: Add {B} or {R}.) As Blood Crypt enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Blood Crypt enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Utvara Scalper
card.property: Flying Utvara Scalper attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He wages war wherever the wind carries him.

card.name: Dread Slag
card.property: Trample Dread Slag gets -4/-4 for each card in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A thousand phobias sopped from the city and wrung from Rix Maadi as one.

card.name: Odds // Ends

alternate.name: Odds
alternate.property: Flip a coin. If it comes up heads, counter target instant or sorcery spell. If it comes up tails, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.

alternate.name: Ends
alternate.property: Target player sacrifices two attacking creatures.

card.name: Crime // Punishment

alternate.name: Crime
alternate.property: Put target creature or enchantment card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

alternate.name: Punishment
alternate.property: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with converted mana cost X.

card.name: Sky Hussar
card.property: Flying When Sky Hussar enters the battlefield, untap all creatures you control. Forecast — Tap two untapped white and/or blue creatures you control, Reveal Sky Hussar from your hand: Draw a card. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

card.name: Simic Growth Chamber
card.property: Simic Growth Chamber enters the battlefield tapped. When Simic Growth Chamber enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {G}{U}.

card.name: Tidespout Tyrant
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast a spell, return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He unmakes the world in his own image.

card.name: Swift Silence
card.property: Counter all other spells. Draw a card for each spell countered this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This world may not know peace, but in my presence you will know quiet." —Augustin IV

card.name: Biomantic Mastery
card.property: Draw a card for each creature target player controls, then draw a card for each creature another target player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look beyond, to the vascular awareness that all life is a map to greater knowledge." —Momir Vig, Biomancy, vol. I

card.name: Psychotic Fury
card.property: Target multicolored creature gains double strike until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rage, my servants. Our ancient power is renewed in blood." —Rakdos

card.name: Simic Initiate
card.property: Graft 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Simic initiates begin their training as experimental subjects. Failures are flushed to the undersewers.

card.name: Blessing of the Nephilim
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each of its colors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before the first stone was laid or the first elf-child born, the power of the nephilim was gathering. Let that power be spread by my hands."

card.name: Guardian of the Guildpact
card.property: Protection from monocolored

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The magic of the Guildpact gives aegis to the spirits pressed into its service. Upon entering the afterlife, they find new focus and are charged with defending the Guildpact against those who would see it broken.

card.name: Riot Spikes
card.property: ({B/R} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most auramancers would have let the spikes hover just above the skin. Having the spikes rip through the skin from beneath was a touch added by Rakdos himself.

card.name: Plaxmanta
card.property: Flash When Plaxmanta enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain shroud until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.) When Plaxmanta enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {G} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Hallowed Fountain
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} or {U}.) As Hallowed Fountain enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Hallowed Fountain enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Overrule
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. You gain X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With one commanding word, the spell was put down and a fine collected for its casting.

card.name: Simic Basilisk
card.property: Graft 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) {1}{G}: Until end of turn, target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat."

card.name: Azorius Ploy
card.property: Prevent all combat damage target creature would deal this turn. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Azorius military tactics, like their legal tactics, capitalize on delay and nullification.

card.name: Entropic Eidolon
card.property: {B}, Sacrifice Entropic Eidolon: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, you may return Entropic Eidolon from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Wit's End
card.property: Target player discards their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some images are so powerful that one glance burns them into your mind forever. Come, let us gaze on nothingness." —Szadek

card.name: Drekavac
card.property: When Drekavac enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a noncreature card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like a vulture's scalp, the face of a drekavac is oily and hairless. The filth and disease of its carrion diet slip off its blood-slick skin.

card.name: Stomp and Howl
card.property: Destroy target artifact and target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mizzium may be impervious to fire, but obviously certain other things can . . . modify its form." —Ivos Koba, indrik handler

card.name: Cackling Flames
card.property: Cackling Flames deals 3 damage to any target. Hellbent — Cackling Flames deals 5 damage to that permanent or player instead if you have no cards in hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I like a little entertainment with my dinner." —Rakdos

card.name: Trial // Error

alternate.name: Trial
alternate.property: Return all creatures blocking or blocked by target creature to their owner's hand.

alternate.name: Error
alternate.property: Counter target multicolored spell.

card.name: Azorius Guildmage
Breeding Pool
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} or {U}.) As Breeding Pool enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Breeding Pool enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Pure // Simple

alternate.name: Pure
alternate.property: Destroy target multicolored permanent.

alternate.name: Simple
alternate.property: Destroy all Auras and Equipment.

card.name: Aurora Eidolon
card.property: {W}, Sacrifice Aurora Eidolon: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, you may return Aurora Eidolon from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Vision Skeins
card.property: Each player draws two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I could see in the other mage's eyes that he'd thought of it too. Then it became a race to exploit the knowledge first."

card.name: Rakdos Ickspitter
card.property: {T}: Rakdos Ickspitter deals 1 damage to target creature and that creature's controller loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our thrulls dissolve from the inside out in a matter of days. Shoddy work, but they're a scream while they last." —Uzric, Rakdos guildmage

card.name: Kill-Suit Cultist
card.property: Kill-Suit Cultist attacks each combat if able. {B}, Sacrifice Kill-Suit Cultist: The next time damage would be dealt to target creature this turn, destroy that creature instead.

card.name: Cytoplast Root-Kin
card.property: Graft 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) When Cytoplast Root-Kin enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. {2}: Move a +1/+1 counter from target creature you control onto Cytoplast Root-Kin.

card.name: Shielding Plax
card.property: ({G/U} can be paid with either {G} or {U}.) Enchant creature When Shielding Plax enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.

card.name: Unliving Psychopath
card.property: {B}: Unliving Psychopath gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {B}, {T}: Destroy target creature with power less than Unliving Psychopath's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The victim bears the marks of the 'Ktozok Impaler'. . . but he was executed years ago!" —Gorev Hadszak, Wojek investigator

card.name: Gnat Alley Creeper
card.property: Gnat Alley Creeper can't be blocked by creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Despite its diminutive name, Gnat Alley is the longest street in Ravnica. Mile after twisting mile, it threads its way among the broader, safer thoroughfares like a parasite.

card.name: Walking Archive
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Walking Archive enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player draws a card for each +1/+1 counter on Walking Archive. {2}{W}{U}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Walking Archive.

card.name: Infernal Tutor
card.property: Reveal a card from your hand. Search your library for a card with the same name as that card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. Hellbent — If you have no cards in hand, instead search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Rakdos Guildmage
card.property: ({B/R} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.) {3}{B}, Discard a card: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. {3}{R}: Create a 2/1 red Goblin creature token with haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Coiling Oracle
card.property: When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Snaking remnants of nature directed by a body of thought and progress, the oracles embody all that is Simic.

card.name: Valor Made Real
card.property: Target creature can block any number of creatures this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As my father taught, 'Training will raise your shield to the blow, but courage fills the gaps the shield leaves open.'"

card.name: Squealing Devil
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) When Squealing Devil enters the battlefield, you may pay {X}. If you do, target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn. When Squealing Devil enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {B} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Rakdos Pit Dragon
card.property: {R} {R}: Rakdos Pit Dragon gains flying until end of turn. {R}: Rakdos Pit Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Hellbent — Rakdos Pit Dragon has double strike as long as you have no cards in hand.

card.name: Magewright's Stone
card.property: {1}, {T}: Untap target creature that has an activated ability with {T} in its cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The stones hark back to an age before civilization, when the living earth blessed all who trod its untamed wilds.

card.name: Dovescape
card.property: ({W/U} can be paid with either {W} or {U}.) Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, counter that spell. That player creates X 1/1 white and blue Bird creature tokens with flying, where X is the spell's converted mana cost.

card.name: Protean Hulk
card.property: When Protean Hulk dies, search your library for any number of creature cards with total converted mana cost 6 or less and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Aquastrand Spider
card.property: Graft 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) {G}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)

card.name: Street Savvy
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 and can block creatures with landwalk abilities as though they didn't have those abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It takes more than swift feet and dark shadows to slip by me unnoticed."

card.name: Evolution Vat
card.property: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature and put a +1/+1 counter on it. Until end of turn, that creature gains "{2}{G}{U}: Double the number of +1/+1 counters on this creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vats are self-contained worlds, bubbling and churning with unnatural speed, boiling down eons of change into moments.

card.name: War's Toll
card.property: Whenever an opponent taps a land for mana, tap all lands that player controls. If a creature an opponent controls attacks, all creatures that opponent controls attack if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Razia, archangel of war, demands total commitment.

card.name: Rakdos Riteknife
Ghost Quarter
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Ghost Quarter: Destroy target land. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where wasted life cries out to be reborn.

card.name: Taste for Mayhem
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0. Hellbent — Enchanted creature gets an additional +2/+0 as long as you have no cards in hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The taste of blood breaks down what little self-control the Rakdos possess.

card.name: Ignorant Bliss
card.property: Exile all cards from your hand face down. At the beginning of the next end step, return those cards to your hand, then draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A quick step beyond oblivion lies a place so full of thoughts that it leaves no room for your own." —Quyzl, chronarch prodigy

card.name: Stalking Vengeance
card.property: Haste Whenever another creature you control dies, it deals damage equal to its power to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Something roams the killing places, sniffing the guilt of the slayers, stalking them on iron paws.

card.name: Azorius Chancery
card.property: Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield tapped. When Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}{U}.

card.name: Vigean Hydropon
card.property: Graft 5 (This creature enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) Vigean Hydropon can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fruits of magic, roots in science.

card.name: Vesper Ghoul
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature's exceptions remind us not to think in absolutes. Just as the orchid blossoms on blackened stone, so does the gift of mana occasionally manifest in the undead." —Bougrat, druid of the Cult of Yore

card.name: Patagia Viper
card.property: Flying When Patagia Viper enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 green and blue Snake creature tokens. When Patagia Viper enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {U} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Enemy of the Guildpact
card.property: Protection from multicolored

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Guilds often exterminate those who saw or knew too much. Some vindictive souls retain their knowledge, using it in the afterlife to crush the guilded and the vile bargain that gives them power.

card.name: Govern the Guildless
card.property: Gain control of target monocolored creature. Forecast — {1}{U}, Reveal Govern the Guildless from your hand: Target creature becomes the color or colors of your choice until end of turn. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

card.name: Psychic Possession
card.property: Enchant opponent Skip your draw step. Whenever enchanted opponent draws a card, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You will do the thinking for the both of us!"

card.name: Delirium Skeins
card.property: Each player discards three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There came a rush, a sudden fire in the mind. Then the two saw only the sooty fog of madness, heard only the crackling of their last thoughts burning away.

card.name: Bond of Agony
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life. Each other player loses X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Rakdos are unique in designing torture equipment they can operate while "suffering" alongside their victims.

card.name: Pillar of the Paruns
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a multicolored spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Built on the very ground where the Ten signed the Guildpact, the tower is a monument to the past and a reminder of who holds power in the present.

card.name: Sprouting Phytohydra
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever Sprouting Phytohydra is dealt damage, you may create a token that's a copy of Sprouting Phytohydra.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A hydra tender's problem isn't having enough defenses but enough pots.
